ProblemRelatedItem.name: ProblemRelatedItem
ProblemRelatedItem.description: Represents a junction object that relates a Problem to an Asset.

AssetId.description: The Asset ID that’s linked to the Problem.

Comment.description: A description of the problem as it relates to the item.

ImpactLevel.description: The related item’s impact on the problem.

ImpactType.description: The effect of the problem-related item on business operations.

Name.description: The auto-generated ID of the problem-related item.

ProblemId.description: The Problem ID that’s related to the Asset.
